articles.author: Michelle Toh, Mohammed Tawfeeq, Anna Cooban
articles.title: Oil prices surge after OPEC+ producers announce surprise cuts - CNN
articles.description: Oil prices spiked Monday after OPEC+ producers unexpectedly announced that they would cut output.
articles.content:
Hong Kong/Atlanta/LondonCNN
  — 
Oil prices spiked Monday after OPEC+ producers unexpectedly announced that they would cut output.
Brent crude, the global benchmark, jumped 5.33% to $84.15 a barre… [+3325 chars]

articles.title: US first-quarter auto sales set to rise on better inventory - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. auto sales are expected to rise for a second straight quarter as automakers are able to ship more vehicles to dealers on time, analysts said, while focus will also be on watching out for signs of plateauing demand.

articles.author: Saleen Martin, USA TODAY
articles.title: Texas woman uses 'cash stuffing' and stimulus check to pay off nearly $80,000 in debt - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Before she started cash stuffing, Jasmine Taylor said she was tired of being in financial distress. She turned that success into 'Baddies and Budgets'
articles.content:
A Texas woman who was nearly $80,000 deep in debt has gone viral for using a saving method called cash stuffing to pay it all off.
Jasmine Taylor, 31, lives in Amarillo, Texas. In January 2021, she … [+5518 chars]

articles.title: Twitter’s new label makes it hard to differentiate between legacy and paid verified accounts - TechCrunch
articles.description: Twitter has introduced a new check mark label that makes it impossible to separate between legacy and paid verified accounts.
articles.content: Twitter was supposed to ceremoniously remove legacy verification checkmarks on April 1. While it appears to have put those plans on hold for now, the Elon Musk-led social network has revised the labe… [+2467 chars]
